page.title: 11The Spike Age
page.content: The{lifestyle}of{teenagers}is depicted by herds of them walking around the town with their hair ten feet in the sky, with sticky gel smeared on it to make it stay there. And if that is not enought, it is red, blue, pink or green. This style is called mohican. Someone has even thought of the idea to create{hair styles}to look like snooker tables, ice cream cones or even a cricket square with wickets and a ball. But for those who are not so adventurous, long hair is back in{ {fashion}and there is a craze to have hair 'permed'. Clothes are very simple. You can adapt what you like such as curtains or Dad's old shirts and trousers to look very fashionable. The colours are usually very dark, but for summer this year (1985), people have gone for light garments.
